cofh.api.block

Interface IBlockConfigGui


  • public interface IBlockConfigGui
    Implement this interface on blocks which have a GUI that needs a tool (e.g., multimeter) to open.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean openConfigGui(IBlockAccess world, int x, int y, int z, ForgeDirection side, EntityPlayer player)
      This function will open a GUI if the player has permission.

    • Method Detail

      • openConfigGui

        boolean openConfigGui(IBlockAccess world,
                    int x,
                    int y,
                    int z,
                    ForgeDirection side,
                    EntityPlayer player)
        This function will open a GUI if the player has permission.
        Parameters:
        world - Reference to the world.
        x - X coordinate of the block.
        y - Y coordinate of the block.
        z - Z coordinate of the block.
        side - The side of the block.
        player - Player doing the configuring.
        Returns:
        True if the GUI was opened.
